errors.UNAUTHORIZED: You are not authorized to view this page.
errors.FORBIDDEN: You do not have permission to view this page.
errors.SOCIAL_ACCOUNT_ALREADY_LINKED: This social account is already linked to another user.
errors.USER_EMAIL_NOT_FOUND: No account found with this email address.
errors.EMAIL_NOT_VERIFIED: Please verify your email address before signing in.
errors.USER_ALREADY_EXISTS: An account with this email already exists.
errors.SESSION_EXPIRED: Your session has expired. Please sign in again.
errors.FAILED_TO_UNLINK_LAST_ACCOUNT: Cannot unlink the last authentication method.
errors.USER_ALREADY_HAS_PASSWORD: User already has a password set.

consumption-per-time-chart.title: Filter the consumption by {granularity}.
consumption-per-time-chart.description: Select one of the bars to view consumption.

consumption-per-category-chart.title: Filter consumption by category.
consumption-per-category-chart.description: Select one of the sections to view consumption.

consumption-per-event-chart.no-events-found: Here you will find the events ordered by highest to lowest consumption. In case the category selected has one or more Tags, the events will be classified into Tags.

delete-section.title: Delete Household
delete-section.description: Permanently remove your household and all of its contents. This action is not reversible, so please continue with caution.

alert-dialog.confirm-description-bold: This will delete the household "{householdName}" and all of its associated data.
alert-dialog.confirm-description-text: This action cannot be undone. Please be certain.

step2.title: Address information (optional).
step2.description: Enter the household address information. This information is optional, but it will help you to identify your household.

sensor-id.label: Sensor ID
sensor-id.description: Enter the 12-character ID from the back of your sensor. Just type the letters and numbers; the colons (:) will be added for you automatically.

leaks.title: Leaks
leaks.description: {count, plural, =0 {You have no leaks} =1 {You have 1 leak} other {You have # leaks}}

categorize.title: Categorize
categorize.description: {count, plural, =0 {You have no events to categorize} =1 {Categorize 1 event} other {Categorize # events}}

new-event-sheet.title: New event
new-event-sheet.no-tags-for-category: No tags found for this category
new-event-sheet.notes-placeholder: Add an optional note for this event
new-event-sheet.either-start-or-end-required: Either start time or end time is required, or both
new-event-sheet.end-cannot-be-before-start: End time cannot be before start time

edit-event-sheet.title: Edit event
edit-event-sheet.notes-placeholder: Add an optional note for this event
edit-event-sheet.no-tags-for-category: No tags found for this category.

edit-tags-dialog.title: Edit tags
edit-tags-dialog.no-tags-for-category: No tags found for this category
edit-tags-dialog.no-tags-for-sink: You can create a tag for the different sinks, for example for the kitchen sink, the bathroom sink, etc.
edit-tags-dialog.no-tags-for-shower: You can create a tag for the different showers, for example for your child's shower, your shower, etc.
edit-tags-dialog.no-tags-for-washer: You can create a tag for the different programs of the washing machine, for example for the eco, sport, etc.
edit-tags-dialog.no-tags-for-dishwasher: You can create a tag for the different programs of the dishwasher, for example for the eco, normal, etc.
edit-tags-dialog.delete-tag-description: Are you sure you want to delete this tag? This action cannot be undone and it will remove the tag from all events that have it.

onboarding.title: Start by creating your first household
onboarding.subtitle: Track your water usage and discover where you can save the most. Letâ€™s get started by setting up your home.

not-found.title: Page not found.
not-found.description: The page you are looking for does not exist.

signin.title: Welcome
signin.description: Enter your email and password to access your account

signup.title: Create your account
signup.description: Enter your information to create a new account
signup.name: Name
signup.success-message: Account created successfully! Please check your email to verify your account.

forgot-password.title: Forgot Password
forgot-password.description: Enter your email to receive a link to reset your password.
forgot-password.success-message: Reset password link has been sent to your email

reset-password.title: Reset Password
reset-password.success-message: Your password has been reset successfully!

invalid-token.title: Invalid or expired reset token.
invalid-token.description: Please request a new password reset.

validation.email-invalid: Please enter a valid email address
validation.password-min: Password must be at least 8 characters
